projects.title: Kevin's Blog
projects.body: React App I created to get a better understanding of React components, hooks and Material UI design. The app features the ability to retrieve all blogs from a database, create blogs, and delete blogs with a chosen author that is also part of the database.
projects.used: JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Material UI

projects.title: Project Euler Problems
projects.body: Come follow my journey of solving challenging Euler problems to hone my skills in creating algorithms. I never thought I would enjoy writing algorithms, but I guess I'm a glutton for punishment.

projects.title: Git 'Er Dun
projects.body: Back-End web app that allows users to create custom To-Do lists in their personal accounts. The app features the ability to add, delete, and edit user list titles and tasks along with authentication upon user log-in and registration of new accounts.
projects.used: JavaScript, Express, Node, MongoDB, EJS Templating, HTML, CSS, BootStrap, JWT

projects.title: Happy Campers
projects.body: Front-End web app that allows users to find campsites upon user input of the National Park of their choice. The app lists out relevant National Parks. When the user selects a park, the app renders a list of associated campsites with details and links to make reservations. The current weather forecast of the park is also rendered.
